SEARCH

Class PetClass

java.lang.Object
PetClass
public class PetClass extends Object
PetClass represents the core pet management system for a virtual pet game. This class handles all pet-related attributes and behaviors including health, happiness, sleep, and inventory management.
Author:
Group78

  • Method Details

    • Setup

      public static void Setup(String name, String type)
      Initializes a new pet with the specified name and type. Sets up initial values for all pet attributes and determines the vital multiplier based on pet type.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the pet
      type - The type of pet (Cat, Dog, or other)

    • getInventory

      public static Inventory getInventory()
      Getter for the pet's inventory.
      Returns:
      The Inventory object containing the pet's items

    • increaseHealth

      Parameters:
      value - The amount to increase health by

      Parameters:

    • increaseFullness

      public static void increaseFullness(int value)
      Increases the pet's fullness by the specified value.
      Parameters:
      value - The amount to increase fullness by

    • decreaseFullness

      public static int decreaseFullness(int value)
      Decreases the pet's fullness by the specified value. If fullness is the vital multiplier for this pet type, the decrease amount is multiplied by the pet's multiplier.
      Parameters:
      value - The base amount to decrease fullness by
      Returns:
      The actual amount decreased (may be modified by multiplier)

    • increaseHappiness

      public static void increaseHappiness(int value)

      Parameters:

    • decreaseHappiness

      Decreases the pet's happiness by the specified value. If happiness is the vital multiplier for this pet type, the decrease amount is multiplied by the pet's multiplier.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The actual amount decreased (may be modified by multiplier)

    • getPetData

      public static Map<String,Object> getPetData()
      Retrieves all pet data in a Map format for saving purposes. This includes all pet attributes and inventory items.
      Returns:
      A Map containing all pet data

    • setPetData

      public static void setPetData(Map<String,Object> petData)
      Sets all pet data from a Map for loading purposes. This method is used to restore pet state from saved data.
      Parameters:
      petData - A Map containing all pet data to restore
